trans-unit.target: Com o método PreFilterProperties, você pode adicionar itens ao dicionário de propriedades que expõe um designer de controle por meio de um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties.
trans-unit.target: As chaves no dicionário de propriedades são os nomes das propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos são do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The properties for the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades para a classe do componente.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize*> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize*>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize*>

trans-unit.source: The RaiseResizeEvent method is obsolete and there is no replacement for this feature.
trans-unit.target: O método RaiseResizeEvent está obsoleto e não há nenhuma substituição para esse recurso.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the properties of the control are read-only at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as propriedades do controle são somente leitura em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class is read-only, by nature.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe é somente para leitura, por natureza.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Read/write features are provided by adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object or using base classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Recursos de leitura/gravação são fornecidos com a adição de um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>objeto ou usando as classes base, como a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ReadOnly property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ReadOnly a propriedade está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class to which you can add editable designer regions or from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> object to which you can create editable designer regions in templates.
trans-unit.target: Derivam o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner>ao qual você pode adicionar editáveis do designers de classe ou do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>ao qual você pode criar designers editáveis nos modelos de objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the properties of the control are read-only at design time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se as propriedades do controle são somente leitura em tempo de design; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Registers internal data in a cloned control.
trans-unit.target: Registra os dados internos em um controle clonado.

trans-unit.source: Whenever an item is cloned, there might be some internal data structures, such as `meta:` attributes, that should be included in the cloned control by the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que um item for clonado, pode haver algumas estruturas de dados internas, como `meta:` atributos, que devem ser incluídos no controle clonado pelo designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: A page developer might add `meta:` attributes to the markup of a control and there is no way, nor is there a reason, for the control to distinguish what those tags might be.
trans-unit.target: Um desenvolvedor de página pode adicionar `meta:` atributos à marcação de um controle há nenhuma maneira, e também não há um motivo, para o controle distinguir o que essas marcas podem ser.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if your control designer provides a way to edit complex properties or formats before applying changes to a page, you would create a clone of the control, pass both the original control and the clone to this RegisterClone method, and then, when the changes are persisted to the tag, all `meta:` attributes are also persisted.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, se o designer de controle fornece uma maneira para editar propriedades complexas ou formatos antes de aplicar as alterações a uma página, você deve criar um clone do controle, passar o controle original e o clone para esse método RegisterClone, e, em seguida, quando as alterações são mantidas para a marca todas as `meta:` atributos também são persistidos.

trans-unit.source: The control associated with the control designer.
trans-unit.target: O controle associado com o designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: The cloned copy of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: A cópia clonada do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: original is null.
trans-unit.target: originalé nulo.

trans-unit.source: -or- clone is null.
trans-unit.target: - ou - clone é nulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control designer for the Web Forms page that contains the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer de controle para a página de Web Forms que contém o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The RootDesigner property represents the control designer for the Web Forms page that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RootDesigner representa o designer de controle para a página de Web Forms que contém o controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the RootDesigner property to access and manipulate the containing Web Forms page at design time.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RootDesigner para acessar e manipular o conteúdo da página Web Forms em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner"></xref> object that can be used at design time to access components on the Web Forms page that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner"> </xref> objeto que pode ser usado em tempo de design para componentes de acesso na página de Web Forms que contém o controle.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content for an editable region of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o conteúdo de uma área editável do controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can support region-based editing on the design surface and override the SetEditableDesignerRegionContent method to set the content for a specified region.
trans-unit.target: Derivando de classes de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe pode dar suporte a edição baseada em região na superfície de design e substitua o método SetEditableDesignerRegionContent para definir o conteúdo para uma região especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An editable design region contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma região de design editável contida dentro do controle.

trans-unit.source: The content to assign for the editable design region.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo para atribuir para a região de design editável.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content for an editable region in the design-time view of the control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o conteúdo de uma área editável no modo de exibição de tempo de design do controle.

trans-unit.source: Normally, the SetRegionContent method is not overridden in derived designers.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o método SetRegionContent não for substituído em designers derivadas.

trans-unit.source: The base class causes the design host to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method for the region.
trans-unit.target: A classe base faz com que o host de design chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>método para a região.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override the SetRegionContent method when custom data is required for the control before calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o método SetRegionContent quando dados personalizados são necessários para o controle antes de chamar <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the SetRegionContent method to insert HTML markup into a region of the control.
trans-unit.target: Use o método SetRegionContent para inserir uma marcação HTML em uma região do controle.

trans-unit.source: An editable design region contained within the design-time view of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma região de design editável contida na exibição do controle de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The content to assign for the editable design region.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo para atribuir para a região de design editável.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified bitwise <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags"></xref> enumeration to the specified flag value.
trans-unit.target: Atribui especificado bit a bit <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags"> </xref> enumeração para o valor de sinalizador especificado.

trans-unit.source: There are several flags that can be set.
trans-unit.target: Existem vários sinalizadores que podem ser definidos.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the SetViewFlags method to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags> value of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property for the control designer, instead of the obsolete <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, use o método SetViewFlags para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags>valor atual <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade para o designer de controle, em vez de obsoleto <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the flag, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to remove the flag.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>definir o sinalizador <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para remover o sinalizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object representing the HTML markup element for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que representa o elemento de marcação HTML para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Tag property is used only for communication between the design host and the control designer and is not used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a propriedade de marca é usada apenas para comunicação entre o host de design e o designer de controle e não é usada por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag"></xref> object that represents the HTML markup element for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag"> </xref> objeto que representa o elemento de marcação HTML para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos, cada um contendo uma ou mais definições de modelo.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é vazio <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the design-time HTML markup for the associated Web server control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml*> method.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a marcação HTML de tempo de design para o controle de servidor Web associado ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml*>

trans-unit.source: The UpdateDesignTimeHtml method is called by the design host to update the display of the associated Web server control at design time, such as when the control has been modified.
trans-unit.target: O método UpdateDesignTimeHtml é chamado pelo host de design para atualizar a exibição de controle de servidor Web associado em tempo de design, como quando o controle foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: Also, a control designer can call the UpdateDesignTimeHtml method after modifying values of the control to update the display of the control.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, um controle de designer pode chamar o método de UpdateDesignTimeHtml depois de modificar os valores do controle para atualizar a exibição do controle.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event, or using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> object to set properties, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface calls the UpdateDesignTimeHtml method for you.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você estiver chamando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>evento ou usando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>objeto para definir propriedades, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>interface chama o método UpdateDesignTimeHtml para você.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer do controle usa um controle de visualização temporárias para gerar a marcação HTML de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a temporary copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl `true`, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade retorna uma cópia temporária do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted to the document.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no controle temporária não são persistentes no documento.

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property for the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl `false`, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade retorna uma instância do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>propriedade do controle.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the instance of the control are persisted.
trans-unit.target: A instância do controle de alterações são mantidas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object is used to set the value of the UsePreviewControl property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>definindo no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>objeto é usado para definir o valor da propriedade UsePreviewControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting determines the type of control that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>configuração que determina o tipo de controle que é retornado pela <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade na <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property as `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>não for especificado na declaração do designer de controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>comportamento de objeto é equivalente a especificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>a propriedade como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*> property for the control contained in the control designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o designer de controle usa uma cópia temporária do controle de visualização de tempo de design. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, se usar o designer de controle de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>propriedade para o controle no designer de controle.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Web server control that can be used for previewing the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um controle de servidor Web que pode ser usado para visualizar a marcação HTML de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The ViewControl property uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to determine its return value.
trans-unit.target: Os usos de propriedade ViewControl o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade para determinar o valor de retorno.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `true`, the ViewControl property returns a temporary copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>é de propriedade `true`, a propriedade ViewControl retorna uma cópia temporária do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no controle temporária não são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `false`, the ViewControl property returns an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property for the control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>é de propriedade `false`, a propriedade ViewControl retorna uma instância do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>propriedade do controle.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the instance of the control are persisted.
trans-unit.target: A instância do controle de alterações são mantidas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>definindo no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>objeto é usado para definir o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting determines the type of control that is returned by the ViewControl property in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>configuração que determina o tipo de controle que é retornado pela propriedade ViewControl na <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property as `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>não for especificado na declaração do designer de controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>comportamento de objeto é equivalente a especificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>a propriedade como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object used by the base class to generate design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> objeto usado pela classe base para gerar uma marcação HTML em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref uid="langword_csharp_View" name="View" href=""></xref> control has been created for display on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <xref uid="langword_csharp_View" name="View" href=""> </xref> controle foi criado para exibição na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if a control has been created for viewing on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se um controle tiver sido criado para exibição na superfície de design; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is visible at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle está visível no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.
